howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Generate high-quality fashion videos in three straightforward steps

items.title: Input Your Concept
items.description: Describe your fashion video idea through natural language. The system understands and processes instructions seamlessly.

items.title: AI Video Creation
items.description: Our advanced AI generates a polished video by synthesizing your input with thousands of fashion visuals and styles.

items.title: Preview and Download
items.description: Review your video with our stunning preview feature and download your final product in high resolution.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say
testimonial.description: Join the community of satisfied users revolutionizing their fashion marketing with AI

items.name: Emily Roberts
items.comment: The AI Fashion Video Generator turned my concepts into reality in no time! It was like magic!

items.name: Jason Lee
items.comment: Creating promotional videos has never been this easy. The quality is phenomenal, and the process is so quick.

items.name: Isabella Martinez
items.comment: WaveSpeed has transformed my fashion brand's online presence. The privacy aspect reassured me that my ideas are safe.

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to common questions about our AI Fashion Video Generator

items.title: What types of videos can I create?
items.description: You can create a variety of fashion-related videos, including lookbooks, promotional clips, runway highlights, and brand showcases.

items.title: Is there a cost to use this feature?
items.description: Yes! Depending on your subscription, you can access different levels of features and video exports. Check our pricing for details.

items.title: Can I use these videos for commercial projects?
items.description: Absolutely! Users on paid plans can use generated videos for any commercial purposes, boosting your brand's visibility.

items.title: How secure is my data?
items.description: All video creations happen in your browser. Your ideas are never stored or shared, ensuring maximum privacy and security.

footer.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Fashion Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI today and experience the future of fashion video creation. No sign-up required.
